name: Castle Crusader DEMO
description:
Fight your way through hordes of enemies and take the castle's loot!

READ ME!!!!

The resolution scaling is super broken and the game pretty much only works right in 1920x1080, click the fullscreen icon in the bottom right when running the game to get things (hopefully) working properly

CONTROLSWASD = Move

ATTACK = Left Mouse Click

AIM WITH THE MOUSE
